5：死亡 9：其他 to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "TBRQ" -- 填报日期 DATETIME 必填 本条数据采集时间，格式YYYY-MM-DD from emr_diagnose a left join (select a.item_id, a.item_name, b.his_item_id from si_yt_report_item a, '202311281108031392669200000000') e on e.his_item_id = a.ADMISSION_CONDITIONS_ID left join (select a.item_id, a.item_name, b.his_item_id from si_yt_report_item a, si_yt_report_item_compare b where = a.DISCHARGE_CONDITIONS_ID, com_hospitalinfo b, ipr_inpatientinfo m where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.orgcode = m.orgcode and a.visit_id = m.inid and m.instate <> '0' and a.DIAGNOSIS_TYPE = '1' and a.orgcode = #{orgcode} and a.crte_time >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.crte_time <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
